resources.string: Tip: Long Press On Any Video To Add It Into Play Next. 😊
Tip: Play Music And Click On ❤ To Add It Into Favourites.
Tip: Click On ➕ To Create New Playlist.
"The only way to do great work is to love what you do." — Steve Jobs
"Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going." — Sam Levenson
"Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it." — Henry David Thoreau
“Health is the greatest gift, contentment the greatest wealth, faithfulness the best relationship.” \n– Buddha
"Believe you can and you're halfway there." — Theodore Roosevelt
"Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated." — Confucius
Breathing reduces depression by calming the nervous system, lowering cortisol, enhancing mindfulness, and improving mood.
Meditation reduces depression by enhancing mindfulness, reducing stress, and promoting emotional balance and resilience.
"Chat with our AI chatbot to reduce loneliness and find a friendly companion anytime!"
Box breathing is a calming technique that involves inhaling, holding, exhaling, and pausing for 4 seconds each cycle.
Relaxation Breathing is a calming technique that involves inhaling, holding, exhaling, and pausing for 4 7 8 seconds each cycle.
